text.content:
Bell Ringer

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}, and it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} until it is no longer sickened.

Bludgeoning

Skewered

Triple damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Piercing

Momentum

You gain a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.Effect: +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls]{+2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls} until the end of your next turn.

Slashing

Petrified

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Petrified] for 10 minutes.

Bomb or Spell
